attributes.action: LEAVE the EU on March 29th (or soon as practical), without any deal if necessary
attributes.additional_details: This petition is put forward in order to counter the actions of those who seek to ignore the public's democratic 2016 referendum decision and appear determined to make this country remain in the EU.
attributes.background: Brexit is under serious threat. We need to ensure we exit the EU in line with the majority vote of 23 June 2016, with a deal in place or without. We need (peacefully) to again show the strength of public support for leaving - so vote now.
